name: Leonardo Cortes
tagline: Consultant, Software Engineer, and Small Business Owner in Ciudad de México, México
body:
Howdy, I’m Leonardo. I’m a consultant living in Ciudad de México, México. I am a fan of technology, programming, and web development. I’m also interested in innovation. You can view my portfolio with a click on the button above.
